td.div:
RotoWire News
:
Winker grounded into two double plays in Saturday's loss to the Nationals, as the team hit into three double plays and left nine runners on base. (6/2/2019)

div.p: We hope you find the FanGraphs Player Stat Pages useful!

Please support FanGraphs by becoming a member. We publish over one thousand articles and podcasts each year, host numerous projection systems, and carry an ever growing database of baseball stats that assist you in your baseball research.
